document.webtitle: You are walking through a field, and you find something to eat. It doesnt have bones, and it doesnt have meat. You pick it up and put it into your pocket. You take it home and put it on a shelf, but 3 days later it walks away. What is it? | Answerbag
document.description: It was probably the " meat" that they put on your burger @ a fast food restaurant ! ... wash and put away all clothes, pick up dishes and trash, take the trash ...

by mcclisteraf on December 6th, 2006
Question
Help answer this question below.
You are walking through a field, and you find something to eat. It doesn't have bones, and it doesn't have meat. You pick it up and put it into your pocket. You take it home and put it on a shelf, but 3 day's later it walks away. What is it? Share your answer here... Want to attach an image to your answer? Click here.
Only upload an image if you have the rights to it, and ensure that it complies with our terms of use .
Like Report Share: Facebook Twitter Other Sort answers by: Greatness / Likes Date submitted Answers. 4 helpful answers below.
by babyccat on December 6th, 2006
an egg maybe??? it hatches and the chick walks away????
Comments
that's correct good job
Report
by mcclisteraf on December 7th, 2006
How warm is your house that an egg will hatch on a shelf!!?
Report

That's what I was thinking!
